en.bdb: The apostate is a big sinner

verse.gurmukhi: bwmHx gWeI vMs Gwq AprwD krwry[
verse.unicode: ਬਾਮ੍ਹਣ ਗਾਂਈ ਵੰਸ ਘਾਤ ਅਪਰਾਧ ਕਰਾਰੇ।

en.bdb: (It is said that) The killing of brahmin, cow and the man of one's own family is a deadly sin.

transliteration.english: baamhan gaa(n)iee va(n)s ghaat aparaadh karaare|
transliteration.hindi: बाम्हण गाँई वंस घात अपराध करारे।
transliteration.en: baamhan gaa(n)iee va(n)s ghaat aparaadh karaare|
transliteration.hi: बाम्हण गाँई वंस घात अपराध करारे।
transliteration.ipa: bɑmʰəɳ Gɑⁿei ʋəŋs Gʰɑt̪ əpərɑt̪ə̀ kərɑre.
transliteration.ur: بامھݨ گاںای وںس گھات اپرادھ کرارے۔

verse.gurmukhi: mdu pI jUey Kyldy johin prnwry[
verse.unicode: ਮਦੁ ਪੀ ਜੂਏ ਖੇਲਦੇ ਜੋਹਨਿ ਪਰਨਾਰੇ।

en.bdb: The drunkards gamble and look at the wives of others.

transliteration.english: madh pee jooe kheladhe johan paranaare|
transliteration.hindi: मदु पी जूए खेलदे जोहनि परनारे।
transliteration.en: madh pee jooe kheladhe johan paranaare|
transliteration.hi: मदु पी जूए खेलदे जोहनि परनारे।
transliteration.ipa: məd̪ pi d͡ʒuee kʰeləd̪e d͡ʒɔhən pərənɑre.
transliteration.ur: مد پیِ جُواے کھےلدے جوهن پرنارے۔

verse.gurmukhi: muhin prweI lCmI Tg cor cgwry[
verse.unicode: ਮੁਹਨਿ ਪਰਾਈ ਲਛਮੀ ਠਗ ਚੋਰ ਚਗਾਰੇ।

en.bdb: The thieves and decoits loot other's wealth.

transliteration.english: muhan paraiee lachhamee Thag chor chagaare|
transliteration.hindi: मुहनि पराई लछमी ठग चोर चगारे।
transliteration.en: muhan paraiee lachhamee Thag chor chagaare|
transliteration.hi: मुहनि पराई लछमी ठग चोर चगारे।
transliteration.ipa: mʊhən pərɑei ləɕəmi ʈʰəG t͡ʃɔr t͡ʃəGɑre.
transliteration.ur: مُهن پراای لچھمیِ ٹھگ چور چگارے۔

en.bdb: These all are treacherous, ungrateful, sinners and killers.
If such persons are gathered in infinite number;

verse.gurmukhi: iekqu lUie n pujnI bymuK gurduAwry ]16]
verse.unicode: ਇਕਤੁ ਲੂਇ ਨ ਪੁਜਨੀ ਬੇਮੁਖ ਗੁਰਦੁਆਰੇ ॥੧੬॥

en.bdb: Even they all are not equal to the single hair of the apostate.

transliteration.english: eikat looi na pujanee bemukh gurdhuaare ||16||
transliteration.hindi: इकतु लूइ न पुजनी बेमुख गुरदुआरे ॥१६॥
transliteration.en: eikat looi na pujanee bemukh gurdhuaare ||16||
transliteration.hi: इकतु लूइ न पुजनी बेमुख गुरदुआरे ॥१६॥
transliteration.ipa: eɪkət̪ lueɪ nə pʊd͡ʒəni bemʊkʰ Gʊrəd̪ʊəɑre.1ə6.
